name: yokai/batch
description: Batch architecture library inspired by Akeneo Batch

suggest.yokai/batch-doctrine-dbal: Store jobs executions in a relational database
suggest.yokai/batch-doctrine-persistence: Write to Doctrine objects to managers
suggest.yokai/batch-symfony-console: Add command to trigger jobs and async job launcher via command
suggest.yokai/batch-symfony-framework: Integrate to Symfony framework via a bundle
suggest.yokai/batch-symfony-serializer: Process items using (de)normalization, serialize job execution for certain storages
